judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree in the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of the Chancellor, Judge Auessandroni. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank W. Hatfield, with him Sabato M. Bendiner and Busser & Bendiner, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Slater, Appellant, v. Slater.
Argued November 18, 1952.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
James U. Molíale, for appellant.
Frank W. Hatfield, with him Sabato M. Bendiner and Busser & Bendiner, for appellees.
February 13, 1953:
